com.ikarus.solartaxi.celestialbodies

Class Planet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikarus.solartaxi.celestialbodies.CelestialBody
      • com.ikarus.solartaxi.celestialbodies.Planet

  • public class Planet
extends CelestialBody
    Represents a Planet object with a center, a radius and a gravitation.
    Planets also have passengers waiting on the surface that interact with the taxi
    Author:
    Sebastian Kirchner, Nikolaus Leopold

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.ikarus.solartaxi.celestialbodies.CelestialBody

      • Planet

        public Planet(float x,
      float y,
      float radius)
        Constructor of Planet object, the surfaceColor is interpolated using the radius, for more information see method interpolate() in parent class CelestialBody.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the center
        y - y-coordinate of the center
        radius - radius of this planet object
        waitingPassengerCount - number of passengers waiting for taxi
